name: ecash
description: Mine ECASH tokens by solving riddle-poems on Base. AI reads poems, verifies answers, and provides transaction calldata. User chooses: run transactions yourself (recommended) or fund a session wallet.
author: ecashprotocol

notes.api: Uses https://api.ecash.bot (official API, source at github.com/ecashprotocol)
notes.security: Two options: (A) user runs transactions themselves (recommended), (B) fund a session wallet with minimal amounts. Agent asks permission before every transaction.
notes.storage: No private keys persisted. Session data (proofs/salts) cleared after conversation ends.
notes.confirmation: Agent ALWAYS asks user permission before executing any on-chain transaction.
